/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene contrast to the busy scene below. The colors in the image are predominantly green from the trees, gray from the buildings, and blue from the sky, painting a vivid picture of a day in the city.
